title: PRIJOUHE Mens Elastic Waist Drawstring Jeans Casual Regular Fit Tapered Leg Distressed Jeans Pants
description: Material: this pair of jeans is made of 60% cotton and 40% polyester, providing a comfortable and durable fit. The fabric is soft, lightweight and breathable, making it perfect for all-day wear. And it is little stretchy.

Design: elastic waist, drawstring closure, tapered leg, regular fit, solid color, 2 slant pockets and 1 back pocket. This jeans pants has 3 color for you choosing, blue, black, khaki, color name start with 06.
Comfortable waist: different from traditional jeans, this jeans' waist is elastic, providing the most comfortable fit. And it is drawstring closure, so you can adjust it.

Occasions: jeans is suitable for all year wear, great for daily wear, casual, work, school, streetwear, skate, party and more outdoor activities. It matches your sneakers, canvas shoes, sweatshirts, shirts very well.

Notice: machine wash or hand wash in cold water. If the price dropped in 7 days when you place an order, please come to us, we will refund you the price difference. Please check the size chart in the product description before order.
